My Favorite NBA Teams

Introduction

I absolutely love the NBA, and have grown up watching it my whole life. This is a sneak peak into my NBA favorites!

  1. The Utah Jazz

    • They are my hometown team
    • They have some of the best colors
    • currently have really fun players to watch

  2. OKC Thunder

    • KD was my favorite player growing up, and he played for the Thunder
    • Also really cool colors
    • Underdawgs just like the Jazz

  3. Milwaukee Bucks

    • They might have the coolest logo in the NBA
    • Have some of my favorite players, like Gianis
    • Also from a small market, but still winning ships
